item.title: WhoAreMyRepresentatives
item.description: WhoAreMyRepresentatives.org (WAMR) is a simple tool to look up the government representatives for any U.S. address. It pulls its information from the Google Civics API and the OpenSecrets API. Used more than 1 million times and maintains steady traffic. Displayed in the top spot of Hacker News for over nine hours. Featured on ProductHunt. Hit the front page of Reddit (5k+ upvotes). Received an (informal) invitation to visit Google. Shared by Dave Lee, Colin Wright, HANA, Mike Elgan, and others.
